attributes.action: To introduce a proportional voting system
attributes.additional_details: The current system is outdated and promotes a 2 party dominance. In the current system only the party with the most votes wins even if that's not what most people want. This system would allow smaller parties to have a say and ensure no votes were wasted
attributes.background: To introduce a new voting system that allows parties to have a proportional say in government depending on how many votes they get. For example if a party gets 41% of votes they have 41% of the say within goverment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554910
